content.question: What is the magnitude of the magnetic field?

choices.label: <math alttext="3.3 times 10 to the negative 20 power tesla" overflow="scroll"><mn>3.3</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>20</mn></mrow></msup><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>T</mtext></math>
